name: Baby games for 2 to 4 year olds
description: Kidss educational games for children from 2 to 5 years. 15 educational preschool games for kids on the development of fine motor skills, coordination, logical thinking and visual perception. Games will help boys and girls in developing basic skills and pre-school education.  Our childrens app includes: - Kidss games for the development of logic - Games for kids to enhance memory - Puzzles for children - Learn the numbers for the smallest - Develops attention and perception - Educational games for children from 2 to 5 years  Our childrens learning games will appeal to both girls and boys.  Age: 2, 3, 4 and 5 years. Preschool education.  You will never find annoying ads inside our app. We are always glad to receive your feedback and suggestions.
